name: PROB_CONTACT
description: This table contains contact specific information on care integrator problems associated with a patient.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the care integrator problem.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date for the problem in internal format.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who added the problem.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAST_EDIT_TIME
columns.description: The instant that this problem was last edited.

columns.name: RESOLVED_YN
columns.description: Indicates if this problem has been resolved.

columns.name: CP_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority level assigned to a given problem.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start date assigned to begin work on a problem.

columns.name: RESOLVED_DATE
columns.description: The date a problem is considered resolved.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: Patient contact serial number (CSN) associated with a particular care plan problem contact.

columns.name: READING_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Documents when the original reading contact was documented. Used to order active documentation readings in the order they clinically happened.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUMBER
columns.description: The serial number of the contact on the care plan problem record.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the care plan problem contact that is associated with the care plan.
